FAQs & Answers

Q: What is Bloxd Forge?
A: Bloxd Forge is your one-stop solution to Bloxd gaming, and much more!
Q: Why are there so few features?
A: There are currently only two active developers, plus both of us have school/work to do.
Q: My computer/virus scanning website says it's a virus. What the flip did you do???
A: We try to use safer methods, but if we were to become a "trusted publisher", we would need to pay a hefty bill to Microsoft(around $500/yr), which is not happening anytime soon.
Q: Why does it look so bad/have so many bugs/is so big/feels useless?
A: As previously stated, this is a passion project. Both developers have a normal life and do not wish to stare at their PC all day(give us a break D:)
Q: Why isn't it open sourced?
A: The code behind the application contains sensitive information, so sadly we can't share it.
Q: Can I support the developers?
A: Yes! Feel free to join our Discord and buy me a cup of coffee or some snacks.
